entry.title: [RBX8][Network] - SNC Network equpement Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 3, 13:00 - 14:00 UTC

Oct 10, 21:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/11/2022 13:00 UTC
End time : 03/11/2022 14:00 UTC
Service impact : For SNC customers who have not correctly configured the two active IPsec VPNs on two different VPNGWs, there will be an interruption of IP traffic between the SNC site and the customer site through the IPsec tunnel for the duration of the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating our network equipment.

entry.title: [BHS/CHI][Network] - Backbone Incident Notification
entry.content:
Oct 20, 18:01 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 20/10/2022 15:55 UTC
Service impact : An increase of latency between Canada and USA may appear.
Root cause : A fiber cut is occurring between Chicago and Beauharnois
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working on the issue to solve the incident. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
